text: As he realises you are not alone, the ranger gives a grunt of surprise. "Honorable duel?" he spits, turning to flee. "You troll=spawned cur!" He runs to a door. By the time he flings it open you have nearly caught up with him. The door leads to a small room in which a STEEL SCEPTRE rests on the granite and turns to face you as you enter the room. "This little baby should equalise the odds," he says, grinning.
